name: Maddog's Treasure Hunt
description:
Help Maddog become a fully fledged Pirate.

As part of his initiation test Maddog has been stranded on a tropical island by the Pirates of the High Seas.

Help him collect all the treasures whilst avoiding the island's ghosts before the timer runs out.

Keys / Joypad:

W / Left = Left

D / Right = Right

S / Down = Face down

Space / Fire = Dig (When you have collected the spade)

P = Pause

Q = Quit

This is an exciting platform/ puzzle game with over thirty exciting screens

For Windows.
